metadata.name: Uncommon Svchost Parent Process
metadata.comment: Detects an uncommon svchost parent process

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\svchost.exe')) AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\mrt.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\msmpeng.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\ngen.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\rpcnet.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\services.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\tiworker.exe')) OR process.parent_process.name is null OR lower(LOWER(process.parent_process.name)) in ('-', '')))

output.summary: Detects an uncommon svchost parent process

metadata.objective: False positive: Unknown Reference: Internal Research
